A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I don't understand how Rian Johnson was able to make such an awful movie with all of the resources he has available. This is easily the worst Star Wars movie to date. There were so many missed opportunities and Leia flyuing through space?!? Luke Skywalker is one of the most beloved heroes in all of science fiction. His presence in this movie is barely noticeable. Snoke\, who was billed as the most diabolical villain in the whole series\, is dispatched without lifting a finger...literally! What a waste! What a mess! What a disappointment! Rian Johnson is to Star Wars what Zach Snyder is to the DC universe\, the destroyer of worlds! Sooo many exclamation points\, I feel like I'm in an episode of Seinfeld.
